description: Main application source file for a Flutter project implementing a menu image generator frontend. It sets up theming, initializes the app, and manages UI logic including camera service integration and environment variable validation.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget defining theme and home screen of the application.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget serving as the main screen interface, handling API key validation and image picking.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing initialization, error handling, and user interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the app.

methods.name: _electricOrangeTheme
methods.description: Defines the custom dark theme emphasizing vibrant orange accents and contrasting UI elements.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and HomeScreen widgets, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: _lazyCameraService
methods.description: Provides instances of CameraService, potentially lazy-loaded.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state, validates environment setup for API key presence.
